prompt:
Convert women's pant size XL in US alphanumeric (0-18) to Italy sizing.

Conversion guide:
Size conversion table (US alphanumeric (0-18) to Italy):
  (Two-step conversion: US alphanumeric (0-18) → US numeric → Italy)
  L → 48
  M → 44
  S → 40
  XL → 50
  XS → 36
  XXL → 52
  XXXL → 54

Provide only the size and nothing else.
